column4: hey guys, I'm trying to setup a t-mobile dash to become a wireless modem for a laptop running 8.10, any thoughts as to how?
hey guys, I'm trying to setup a t-mobile dash to become a wireless modem for a laptop running 8.10, any thoughts as to how?
I've used wifi-radar for this on another distro and it went just fine. What kind of encryption does the TMO net use?
You should definitely know this and the keyphrase to connect to it
It might be WPA, I don't know if you can set it up with the network button in the upper bar
ok, in vista it asks for nothing, you just plug it in and it just connects.
So it should be an open network if you didn't enter any password or a thing like that
Try connecting with wifi-radar, DHCP enabled.
ok, let me see if I can nab that.
Should be in apt-get or Synaptic
Ok, tell what it finds and what you get
him program says it can't lauch?
Open a console, fire it up there with sudo and see what it reports
